title.rendered: Dream Pairs Introduces New Comfortable Pumps for Standing All-Day: Adina Pumps

content.rendered:
LOS ANGELES - January 18, 2023 - (Newswire.com)

Dream Pairs, a leading female-focused footwear brand, is excited to announce Adina, the second version of their Stand-All-Day comfortable pumps designed specifically for standing all-day. Dream Pairs has previously launched their first versions of Stand-All-Day comfortable pumps called Edena and Edenia, and now they are excited to annouce the release of Adina, the latest version with significant improvements. 

Sole Flexi Insole - Walk with comfort that feels like a massage.
Standing or walking for long hours can be tiring and uncomfortable, but a pair of comfortable pumps designed specifically for standing all day aims to change that. Edena and Edenia feature a Sole Flexi Insole that gives a sculpted fit that cradles the foot and provides a custom fit that helps disperse weight, prevents exposure to friction, and relieves pressure where the wearer needs it most.  

The Sole Flexi insole features a 2mm latex layer that adds softness and support for all-day wear. It also includes a 4mm thick foam that provides adequate arch and heel support. The insole has a skin-friendly top layer that is super soft on the skin and reduces friction and helps distribute pressure evenly. 

Unleash All-day Comfort With Adina: The Ultimate Upgrade
Dream Pairs' first versions of the Stand-All-Day comfortable pumps, Edena and Edenia, are already great products that provide comfort and style for those who need it most. However, they left some rooms unfilled. That's why they're excited to announce the second version of their Stand-All-Day comfortable pumps designed to provide foot contact for all-day relief. 

In addition to the unmatched all-day comfort and advantage of Sole Flexi insole mentioned above, Adina comes with the following improvements. 

  • A padded deeper toe box that protects and minimizes discomfort, making it more comfortable than the first version. 
  • Adina's sophisticated pointed-toe silhouette adds elegance to customer's outfit, keeping them supported and stylish. Also, it comes in classic colors for everyone and a Geometric block heel that distributes force evenly and adds to their comfort.
  • Adina also offers more beautiful insole styles than the first version.

Adina is now available at the Dream Pairs' online store. Customers can try the product and experience the premium comfort and style it provides.

About Dream Pairs
Dream Pairs (https://www.dreampairshoes.com) is a top female footwear brand that has been helping women and children look great on every occasion since 2009. The company offers a wide range of quality, stylish, and comfortable women's shoes, such as knee-high boots, pumps, heels, etc. With the belief that a great pair of shoes is an effortless way to exude confidence, passion, and positivity, Dream Pairs makes them available in unique designs and prices that won't break the bank.


Contact Information:
PR Officer
PR Officer
pr@dreampairshoes.com


Press Release Service by Newswire.com

Original Source: Dream Pairs Introduces New Comfortable Pumps for Standing All-Day: Adina Pumps
